name: Contraception Education
description: States have individual content requirements for what is taught in sex and STD/HIV education programs. While this map shows contraception education in sexuality education for birth control, much less states cover contraception education or condoms in STD/HIV education.

source.name: Guttmacher Institute
source.title: State Laws and Policies: Sex and HIV Education

groups.name: Contraception education required in sexuality education programs
No contraception education in sexuality education programs
